## Programming Experiments

- [PsychoPy](http://www.psychopy.org/) - a free, powerful alternative to Presentation™ or e-Prime™, written in Python
- [OpenSesame](https://osdoc.cogsci.nl/3.1/) - Another free experiment presentation software.  Nicer interface than PsychoPy, but does not work on all Macs.

## Animation / Video

- [Open Broadcasting System](https://obsproject.com) - Free and open source software for video recording and live streaming
- [av package for R](https://github.com/ropensci/av#readme) - The av Package: Production Quality Video in R [(blog)](https://ropensci.org/technotes/2018/10/06/av-release/)
